transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Jewel of the Firelord

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 140,238 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Envenom, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Envenom, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you would lose Winning Streak!, you have a chance to instead gain maximum stacks of Winning Streak! for 4s. These cannot be removed and have 50% additional effect while immune to removal.

name: Irradiated Undercoat

spells.description: Equip: Chance on hit to draw Unstable Isotopes from any Irradiated Elemental or Contaminated Glob.

Use: Absorb 100 Unstable Isotopes, increasing threat generation by 20%, Nature damage taken by 5%, and periodically heals the caster for 1% to 5% per 6 sec for 30 min.

Only usable on Mechagon Island. (1 Day Cooldown)

description: The metal links have a slight green glow to them. Wearing it cannot possibly be good for you.

Set: When you would lose Winning Streak!, you have a chance to instead gain maximum stacks of Winning Streak! for 4s. These cannot be removed and have 50% additional effect while immune to removal.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 4,211 or your lowest secondary stat by 5,313 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 421 Agility up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 112,577 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 168,875.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
